QuestionTxt: From what you have read or heard, do you personally think certain vaccines do--or do not--cause autism in children, or are you unsure?
StudyNote: Interviews were conducted with respondents on landline telephones and cellular phones. The sample includes 50% landline and 50% cell phone respondents.
